body_html:
Getting the exact same issue here, worked perfectly on exact same hardware a few days ago. It seems to be an issue with a recent commit.

Ubuntu 14.04, TITAN X, python2, CUDA 7.5, CuDNN 5.1

EDIT: The issue no longer occurs when I try building v0.9.0. I also tried with v0.10.0, and while this issue did not occur, I experienced #4105 instead.
